Language.Text: Good Morning Sir/Madam. It is currently 22 degrees celsius outside with a chance of light showers. If you look in your closet there will be a suitable outfit for today. There have been 3 local car accidents overnight. Please drive carefully. My research shows that assault rates have risen 2 percent in the past week. It certainly is a dangerous world out there.
Are you sure you need to leave the house?
Logic would dictate staying inside where I can keep you safe.
